title.en: Your Majesty, Please Spare Me This Time

altTitles.fr: Votre majesté, ne me tuez pas encore s'il vous-plaît!

description.ar:
بعد مذبحة الإمبراطور الغير عادلة لـعائلتها وموتها البائس، تستيقظ لارييت فيلوس لتجد أنها في جسد نفسها البالغة من العمر 12 عامًا، وضعتنصب عينيها فورًا على هدفٍ واحد: الأقتراب من الإمبراطور روبرت إدغار راسبي فيليلوم و أيضًا أنقاذ عائلتها، خطة لارييت مضمونة باستثناء أمرًاواحد... في جدولها الزمني الحالي، لا يزال الإمبراطور المستقبلي يتنكر كأميرة تدعى لافيرت! بحقيبة واحدة فقط وبعض العملات المعدنية في جيبها،تنطلق إلى العاصمة لتصبح أقرب و اكثر خادمة شرف محبوبة للأميرة، هل تستطيع لارييت إثبات قدرتها على الحفاظ على السر؟ والأهم من ذلك، هلستكون قادرة على الفوز بمحبة روبرت القاسي والسادي؟

---

description.de:
Nach dem ungerechten Massaker des Kaisers an ihrer Familie und ihrem eigenen elenden Tod wacht Laliette Bellua im Körper ihres zwölfjährigen Ichs auf. Sofort setzt sie sich ein einziges Ziel: Sich bei Kaiser Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum einschmeicheln und ihre Familie retten. Laliettes Plan ist kinderleicht, bis auf ein klitzekleines Detail ... In der gegenwärtigen Zeit gibt sich der zukünftige Kaiser noch als Prinzessin Rapertte aus! Mit nur einem einzigen Koffer und etwas Kleingeld macht sie sich auf den Weg in die Hauptstadt, um das liebste und vertrauteste Dienstmädchen der Prinzessin zu werden. Kann Laliette ihr Geschick, ein Geheimnis zu bewahren, beweisen? Und vor allem: Wird sie es schaffen, die Gunst der unbarmherzigen und sadistischen Rapertte zu erlangen?

---

description.en:
Following the emperor's unjust massacre of her family and her own miserable death, Laliette Bellua wakes up to find that she is in the body of her 12-year-old self. She immediately sets her sights on a single goal: suck up to Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum and save her family. Laliette's plan is foolproof, except for one tiny detail... In her present timeline, the future emperor is still masquerading as a princess named Rapertte! With only a single suitcase and some change in her pocket, she sets out for the capital to become the princess' closest and most beloved attendant. Can Laliette prove her ability to keep a secret? And more importantly, will she be able to win the favor of the cruel and sadistic Rapertte?

---
It was the end of a sunny summer day. In the hands of the tyrant, father, mother, brother and my neck went under the guillotine. And when I opened my eyes, it was my 12th birthday. Before the 13-year-old young Emperor became a brutal tyrant, I had to somehow become a god next to the man.

"I'm your maid of honor, so I'll follow you."

"I don't have much. And I don't own you."

To live and to save my family, I have to be in the eyes of that tyrant who didn't believe in humanity. Only then I can live. But that horrible monster is starting to change.

"I save what I lose in my hands. So don't hurt yourself without my permission."

---

description.fa:
پایان یک روز آفتابی تابستان بود. در دستان ستمگر ، پدر ، مادر ، برادر و گردن من زیر گیوتین رفت. و وقتی چشمانم را باز کردم ، تولد 12 سالگی من بود. قبل از اینکه امپراطور جوان 13 ساله به یک ستمگر بیرحم تبدیل شود ، من مجبور شدم به نوعی در کنار آن مرد باشم. "من کنیز افتخار تو هستم ، بنابراین تو را دنبال خواهم کرد." "من چیز زیادی ندارم. و مالک شما نیستم." برای زندگی و نجات خانواده ام ، باید در چشم آن ظالم باشم که به بشریت اعتقادی نداشت. فقط در این صورت است که می توانم زندگی کنم. اما آن هیولای وحشتناک در حال تغییر است. "من آنچه را که از دست می دهم ذخیره می کنم. بنابراین بدون اجازه من به خودت آسیب نرسان."

description.fr:
Après que l'Empereur a injustement massacré sa famille et qu'elle a perdu la vie, Laliette Bellua se réveille dans son corps d'enfant de douze ans. Aussitôt, elle ne se fixe qu'un objectif: obtenir les bonnes grâces de l'Empereur Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum et ainsi sauver sa famille. Le plan de Laliette est infaillible, à un détail près... À l'époque actuelle, le futur empereur se fait passer pour une princesse nommée Rapertte! Avec un seul bagage et un peu d'argent en poche, elle part pour la capitale afin de devenir la domestique préférée de la princesse. Laliette sera-t-elle en mesure de garder le secret? Et surtout, saura-t-elle gagner les faveurs de la cruelle et sadique Rapertte?

---

description.ko:
햇볕 강한 여름날의 죽음이었다.
열 여덟, 폭군의 손에 아버지와 어머니, 동생, 뒤이어 내 목까지 단두대 위에서 잘려나갔다.

그리고 나는 눈을 떴다.
열 두살의 생일이었다.

열 세살의 어린 황녀(?)가 잔인한 폭군 황제가 되기 전에 나는 어떻게든 저 인간 옆에 붙어 간신이 되어야 했다.

"저도 전하의 시녀니까 전하만을 따르겠어요."
"난 가진 게 별로 없어. 그리고 넌 내 것이 아니야."

살기 위해, 가족을 구하기 위해
인간 불신에 빠진 저 폭군의 눈에 들어야 해.

그래야만 내가 살 수 있어.

그런데 끔찍한 저 괴물이 점점 달라지기 시작한다.

"난 내 손에 쥔 것은 아껴. 그러니까 내 허락없이 네 몸에 상처 내지 마."

description.pt:
Por causa do testemunho de meu pai sobre o tirano, meu pescoço foi cortado com a família na guilhotina. Quando acordei eu estava em meu aniversário de doze anos novamente. Para salvar a família, decidi me tornar o segredo do tirano. Então, Vossa Majestade, vamos nos aproximar. Vou fazer o meu melhor com sinceridade, então não me mate de novo! “Porque estou realmente do lado de vossa Majestade? Eu juro!" "Cale-se." “Novamente, eu o amo. Não machuque seu corpo sem minha permissão.”

---

description.ru:
Я умерла в солнечный летний день. Мне было восемнадцать лет. Человек, чьи руки были по локоть в крови, казнил меня и всю мою семью. Я очнулась. Мне снова 12…
Время, когда юный принц ещё не стал жестоким императором-тираном. Мне нужно выжить, находясь рядом с ним. Я стану хитрей.
«Ваше Высочество, я ваша новая горничная, клянусь всегда следовать за вами.»
«Ты не моя вещь.»
Чтобы выжить и спасти свою семью, я должна суметь втереться в доверие к Императору, который утопает в недоверии к людям. Но этот ужасающий человек постепенно начал меняться?
«Я берегу то, что принадлежит мне, и поэтому без моего разрешения не смей вредить себе.»

---

description.vi:
Đó là sự kết thúc của một ngày hè đầy nắng. Dưới bàn tay của bạo chúa, cha, mẹ, anh trai và tôi đã phải chịu máy chém cổ. Và khi tôi mở mắt ra,thì lại là sinh nhật thứ 12 của tôi. Trước khi vị Hoàng đế trẻ 13 tuổi trở thành một bạo chúa tàn bạo, tôi phải nghĩ cách để trở thành một hầu cận bên cạnh người đàn ông đó. "Em là phù dâu của anh, nên anh sẽ phải đi theo em." "Ta không có thứ gì cho em cả.Và ta cũng không coi em là vật sở hữu." Để có thể sống sót và cứu lấy gia đình mình, tôi phải Luôn ở trong tầm mắt của tên bạo chúa không tin vào nhân loại kia. Chỉ khi đó tôi mới có thể sống. Nhưng con quái vật khủng khiếp đó đang bắt đầu thay đổi. "Ta sẽ dành lại những thứ mà ta đã mất trong tay.Vì vậy, xin đừng tự làm tổn thương mình khi chưa được phép của ta”

description.en: Strange bunny girls have been appearing all over the city, attempting to recruit people into a mysterious cult known as "The Warren Divine".

altTitles.ja: Tomo Chan ha Onnanoko!
トモちゃんは女の子!

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

description.en:
Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side...

On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!

An idol with secrets × A caring manager 

Their story begins in the smoking area...
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

title.en: Isekai de Seijo ni natta Watashi, Genjitsu Sekai demo Seijo Cheat de Kanzen Shouri!

altTitles.ja: 異世界で聖女になった私、現実世界でも聖女チートで完全勝利！

description.en: Byodoin Mioa (Reia) was having the worst day of her life, with her family falling and bullies targeting her... One day, however, she travels to a world in a mysterious mirror and becomes a 'saint'. Then she acquires mysterious skills, successfully loses weight and transforms into a beautiful figure. In the other world and in reality, the saint cheat is a great turnaround!

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

altTitles.vi: Người đàn ông không thể ly hôn CASE 2

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

altTitles.ja: ジャンケットバンク

description.en: "Junket Bank" is a manga of a gambling place operated by a bank. Mitarai, a bank clerk bored with his every day duties. One day, Mitarai went to the basement of the bank while thinking that something was wrong with his new boss Usami, but witnessed gambling there...

altTitles.ja: バビル２世　ザ・リターナー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

altTitles.ja: テイミングマスター

description.de:
Das bekannteste VR-Spiel der Welt, 'Kaillan'. Ian ist ein zertifizierter Spielsüchtiger, der in der virtuellen Welt bekannt ist. Obwohl Ian einen Level 93 Archer-Charakter in den Top-Bestenlisten von Kaillan hat, beschließt er, ihn zu löschen, obwohl alle um ihn herum ihm gesagt haben, er solle es nicht tun. Alles, um sich in eine versteckte Klasse zu verwandeln, die er zufällig erhalten hatte. Die Klasse, die er gewählt hat, ist die wertloseste Klasse in Kaillan, die Summoner-Klasse. Wenn er vermeiden will, ein F im College zu bekommen, muss er innerhalb von zwei Monaten auf sein vorheriges Level aufsteigen … Kaillan ist bekannt für sein sehr grausames Levelsystem, bei dem es über ein Jahr dauern soll, bis Level 100 erreicht ist. Seine Kämpfe, in nur zwei Monaten Level 93 zu erreichen, entfalten sich … Level schnell, gründlich und beharrlich. Die Legende vom 'Bändigungsmeister' beginnt! - Google Translate, bessere Übersetzung kommt bald…

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%85%8C%EC%9D%B4%EB%B0%8D-%EB%A7%88%EC%8A%A4%ED%84%B0/2433)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Taming_Master/187)
description.en: Jinsung may look like your average college student, but in the harsh VR world of Kaillan, he’s Ian, a mighty level 93 archer! So when he suddenly resets his character, everyone thinks he’s totally nuts! What they don’t realize is that Jinsung has unlocked a powerful, new hidden class. Now, taming monsters is tough, and leveling up is a slog. But when his VR-loving teacher threatens to fail him, Jinsung has just two months to level up and achieve glory as the one and only Taming Master!
description.es: En el juego de realidad virtual más jugado del mundo "Kaillan", un certificado adicto al juego bien conocido como, Ian. A pesar de tener un personaje arquero de nivel 93 en la cima de la tabla de puntuaciones de Kaillan, Ian decide borrarlo aun cuando todos le decían que no lo hiciera. Solo para obtener una oportunidad de desbloquear una clase oculta. La clase de personaje que escogió es la más inútil en Kaillan, la clase invocadora, si quiere evitar el sacar una calificación de F en la universidad, el necesita que su personaje llegue al nivel que tenía su antiguo personaje en un lapso de 2 meses... Kaillan es notorio por su cruel sistema de niveles, donde se dice que puede tomar un año alcanzar el nivel 100. Su lucha por llegar al nivel 93 en solo 2 meses comienza... Subiendo rápidamente de niveles, a través de la perseverancia. La leyenda de el "Maestro Domador" ¡comienza!
description.id:
Ian, atau yang bernama asli Park Jinseong ialah seorang mahasiswa jurusan Virtual Reality ini merupakan salah satu dari jutaan user VR game terkenal di dunia 'Kaillan'. Tak sengaja melihat berita tentang pekerjaan tersembunyi baru, Ian yang saat itu seorang Archer jutawan merasa tertarik untuk mengganti pekerjaannya dan menjelajah dunia baru. Meski dengan resiko kehilangan semua kemampuan juga harta, ditambah dengan taruhan dengan sang dosen yang mengancam akan memberi surat peringatan dan nilai F di semua kelas jika tak bisa kembali ke level 93, Ian tetap memilih untuk mengganti pekerjaan sebagai Animal Summoner yang menurut kebanyakan orang payah. Ia menemukan keseruan tersendiri merawat dan berpetualang bersama temannya 'Rai' menangkap banyak monster.

Lalu, bagaimana serunya petualangan Ian dan 'Rai' di Kaillan hingga menjadi Taming Master? Apakah Ian bisa memenangkan taruhan dengan sang dosen dan terbebas dari nilai F serta surat peringatan universitas?

---

description.ja:
世界中で有名なVR(仮想現実)ゲーム「カイラン」。 仮想現実学科で有名な自他公認のゲーム廃人であるイアン。 サーバー上位圏の弓士だったにもかかわらず、偶然得た隠しクラスへジョブチェンジするため、イアンは思い切ってレベル93のキャラクターを削除する。 しかし彼が選んだのはポンコツジョブの召喚術師だった？ そんな中、落第を避けるため2ヶ月以内に以前と同じレベル93を目指すことになり… レベル100までは1年かかるといわれるほどハードなカイランで、イアンの孤軍奮闘が繰り広げられるのだが… レベルアップを目指してより速く、全力で、諦めずに進め 『テイミングマスター』の伝説がはじまる！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%85%8C%EC%9D%B4%EB%B0%8D-%EB%A7%88%EC%8A%A4%ED%84%B0/2433)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Taming_Master/187)
description.ko:
전 세계에서 가장 인지도 높은 VR(가상현실) 게임 ‘카일란’. 
가상현실학과에서도 유명한 자타공인의 게임 폐인 이안. 

서버에서 순위권에 드는 궁수로서 남부러울 것 없는 그가
우연히 획득하게 된 히든 클래스로의 전직을 위해 주위의 반대를 무릅쓰고
93레벨의 캐릭터를 과감히 삭제한다.

그가 선택한 것은 카일란 최고의 노답 직업인 소환술사? 
엎친 데 덮친 격으로 F학점을 피하려면 두 달 안에 
삭제한 캐릭터의 레벨까지 올려야 하는데…

100렙까지는 1년이 걸린다는 극악의 레벨업을 자랑하는 카일란에서
불과 두 달만에 93레벨을 찍기 위한 그의 고군분투가 펼쳐지는데...

레벨 업을 향해 더 빨리, 더 철저하게, 더 끈질기게
『테이밍 마스터』의 전설이 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%85%8C%EC%9D%B4%EB%B0%8D-%EB%A7%88%EC%8A%A4%ED%84%B0/2433)

description.ru:
Самая популярная в мире игра виртуальной реальности, «Кайллан». Всем известный игрок виртуальной реальности, Ян. Он удалил своего персонажа 93 уровня, чтобы получить скрытый класс… Однако этот класс в итоге оказался самым бесполезным в Кайллане — призывателем! Кроме того, внезапный звонок от его профессора практически сводит его с ума! Чтобы избежать испытательного срока в академии, ему необходимо поднять тот же уровень, что был у его удаленного персонажа, всего за два месяца!

ปาร์กจินซอง หรือชื่อไอดี 'เอียน' ยอมทิ้งตัวละครนักธนูที่เขาปั้นมาจนถึงเลเวล 93 ในเกม VR สุดฮิต 'ไคล์ลัน' เพื่อจะเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพลับที่เพิ่งอัปเดต
แม้จะต้องสูญเสียกำไรก้อนโตที่เคยได้จากตัวละครเก่าและต้องเริ่มต้นนับหนึ่งใหม่ แต่การผจญภัยใน 'ไคล์ลัน' ของเขาก็เปิดฉากขึ้นอีกครั้งพร้อมด้วยอาชีพลับ 'เทมมิงมาสเตอร์' ที่จะทำให้เขาได้มอนสเตอร์คู่หูมาร่วมสร้างตำนานอีกเพียบ!

title.en: Hazure Zokusei "Hikari Mahou" ga Kakusei Shite Laser ga Demashita

altTitles.ja: ハズレ属性「光魔法」が覚醒してレーザーが出ました【タテヨミ】

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Zokusei Hikari Mahou ga Kakusei Shite Laser ga Demashita (Tatecomi)

altTitles.en: I Awakened the Garbage Attribute "Light Magic" and a Laser Came Out

description.en:
The day of the "Attribute" assessment when you turn 10.
A boy raised in an orphanage, dreaming of becoming an adventurer—Light was granted the rare attribute of Light, which appears once in every 1,000 people.

However, while it was rare, the Light attribute was called a "failure attribute."
...Because the light magic learned from the Light attribute had absolutely no offensive power!

──Eventually, Light, who had become the adventurer he had always dreamed of, was mocked as the "specialist in parasitism" and the "walking torch," but he continued to train his Light magic to the extreme.

Then, when he reached the near-max level of [Light] attribute at Level 9──.
After his training, with an immense amount of magical power, his childhood friend Saya appeared and requested to accompany him to an AAA difficulty dungeon...

Little did he know, this would turn into the worst expedition of his life...
description.ja:
10歳でうける『属性』診断の日。
孤児院で育ち、冒険者を夢見る少年・ライトは、1000人に１人の確立で出るというレア属性【光】を授かった。
しかし、レアではあるが光属性は『ハズレ属性』と呼ばれていた。
冒険者を夢見るライトにとっては、致命的なレア属性【光】。
それでも、夢をあきらめず、冒険者となったライトは……

altTitles.th: อาชาศึกผู้ภักดีของทรราช

description.en: This is the story of a middle-aged man who is reincarnated as a horse in the world of a novel he once read. Along with that, he’s stuck with a system that forbids him from going OOC (out of character) in his horse form. On top of that, there are characters acting like NPCs, constantly giving him quests to complete.

altTitles.ja: ゴーストハンター

description.en: In a world where ghost hunters work under GMC (Ghost Management Company), a ghost hunter who wakes up in his younger brother's body searches for his brother's soul and gets one step closer to the truth surrounding the company.

title.en: Skill Taker Of Other World Domination

altTitles.ja: 異世界支配のスキルテイカー

description.en:
This is the story of a young boy who will one day come to be known as the “Ruler” in another world. Yuuto Konoe, a martial arts prodigy, is summoned to a foreign world where slaves are bought and sold. There, he acquires a unique skill called "Skill Taker," which allows him to steal the abilities (skills) of defeated monsters. While aiming to build a harem of 100 slaves, he begins his leisurely life in this new world.

(This work is based on the light novel “Skill Taker’s World Domination: Building a Slave Harem from Scratch” by Kodansha Ranobe Bunko, adapted into a webtoon.)

Yuu is famous for having an extreme brother complex. In reality, she has emotions for her little brother, Hiro, which have far exceeded a normal sisterly love. A little complicated family love comedy from the author of "Hyakko." This is a story of forbidden love with an older sister, a younger brother and their half sibling Tomo as well.

title.en: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara

altTitles.ja: ドラマな恋は基本から

altTitles.ja-ro: Drama na Koi ha Kihon kara

altTitles.en: Dramatic Love Starts from the Basics

description.en: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female  doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!
description.ja: 「35歳独身、彼女なし、実家暮らし」の平凡なサラリーマン・悠木慎史。独りで生きる未来に不安があるけれど、恋愛経験は少ないし婚活も怖い――。そんな悠木が、とあるアクシデントで医師・伴瑛理子と出会い、人生がひっくり返る「想像以上の恋」に落ちる！ 　大ヒット社会人恋愛漫画『この会社に好きな人がいます』の榎本あかまるが贈る、ミドサーから始める恋愛トレーニング!!
description.pt-br:
A vida de Shinji Yuuki dá uma guinada inesperada quando ele conhece uma médica, despertando um amor que desafia seus medos e incertezas. Seu mundo ordinário como empresário é jogado no caos, à medida que esse novo afeto o tira da zona de conforto e o obriga a enfrentar suas ansiedades mais profundas sobre relacionamentos e o futuro.

Há alguma direção específica que você gostaria que essa história tomasse, ou desafios particulares que Shinji possa enfrentar ao navegar por esse romance inesperado?

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

altTitles.ja: 花秘める君のメテオール

description.en:
“On that night, I became the cursed monster’s bride—”

Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella’s younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the “Monster’s Bride”.
Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette.
And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.

A devoted girl and a vampire who gave up everything, intertwined in a heartrending, beautiful story of love and curses.

title.en: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkouichi no Bishoujo o Kudoiteita Rashii: Baito-saki no Soudan Aite ni Ore no Omoibito no Hanashi o Suru to Kanojo wa Naze ka Tere Hajimeru

altTitles.ja: 俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～

altTitles.en: It Seems I Was Hitting on the Most Beautiful Girl in School Without Me Noticing: When I Told My Friend at Work About the Girl I Love She Started to Get Embarrassed for Some Reason

description.en:
The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her.

That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job.

He doesn’t realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her.

The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.
description.ja:
**俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～
趣味の読書を通じて知り合った**

学校一の塩対応美少女・斎藤玲奈と田中湊。
湊は玲奈とのことをバイト先の先輩である柊玲奈に相談するも、なぜか彼女が真っ赤になる!?
すれ違い勝ち確ラブコメ開幕!

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en:
With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
___
[Defunct Official English (MANGA Plus)](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100291)
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.en: Please Marry Me With Divorce in Mind

altTitles.ja: 結婚しよう。離婚前提で。

description.en:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?
description.pt-br:
Depois de completar 30 anos como NEET, Kyousuke foi expulso da casa de seus pais.
Foi então que Rui, o seu melhor amigo, propôs uma solução: casar e depois divorciar-se!

Um rapaz e uma moça que são “apenas amigos” há cerca de uma década decidem entrar em um casamento de mentira.
Ele é um romântico e ela é apenas uma garota pragmática. Um casal inadequado para o casamento.
O que eles descobrirão depois de 100 dias juntos?

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal/volumes)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.ja: 夢と恋ではつり合わない

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ja: 飯だけ食ってレベルアップ

altTitles.th: กินจุทะลุเลเวล

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

Menderita penyakit langka di mana hanya ada dua orang penderita di seluruh dunia, Minhyuk harus hidup sambil mengontrol nafsu makannya. Segala cara sudah dicoba untuk mengurangi berat badan Minhyuk, namun itu hanya semakin membuatnya lapar hingga dokter pribadinya menyarankan 'Athenae'. Sebuah VR Game di mana pemainnya bisa makan sepuasnya di dalam sana tanpa khawatir berat badan naik. Begitulah petualangan Minhyuk dimulai, tentu saja ditemani makanan-makanan lezat pada setiap quest-nya!

description.it:
personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

하루하루 살기 위해 먹는 걸 조절하며 살아가고 있지만 희망이 없어보인다, 
의사의 추천으로 시작하게 된 가상현실게임 '아테네'에서는 음식을 마음껏 먹고도 살이 찌지 않는데.

Во всём мире только два человек подвержены этому редкому заболеванию.
Для того, чтобы выжить мне приходится следить за тем, что я ем. В виртуальной игре "Афины", к которой я присоединился по рекомендации врача, я никак не могу набрать вес, даже если ем до отвала.
Фантазия гурмана, где тебе приходится есть, чтобы выжить.

คังมินฮยอก เป็นผู้ป่วยโรคกินไม่หยุด หนึ่งในโรคหายากที่มีแค่ไม่กี่คนในโลก
เขาต้องออกกำลังกายและควบคุมอาหารในแต่ละวันอย่างยากลำบากเพื่อให้มีชีวิตรอด
แต่แล้วหมอก็แนะนำวิธีการรักษาแบบใหม่ด้วยการเล่นเกมออนไลน์เสมือนจริง ""อาเธเน่"" ที่ผู้เล่นสามารถรับรู้รสชาติอาหารในเกมได้
เรื่องราวการผจญภัยแสนอร่อยชวนน้ำลายสอของมินฮยอกจึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!

敏赫身高185cm，他控制食量，每天运动4个小时，可他的体重却只能控制在170kg。他家境优渥、成绩优异，各方面都很完美，除了体重。这都是因为他患有罕见的暴食性缺失症。不管吃多少东西，他都无法得到满足。完美体验味觉感受的虚拟现实游戏——雅典，也许是可以解救他的最后一把钥匙？！

主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

title.en: The Markgraf is Obsessed With the Half-Demon Dragon Knight

altTitles.ja: 半魔の竜騎士は、辺境伯に執着される

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanma no Ryuukishi wa, Henkyouhaku ni Shuuchaku Sareru

description.en: In the Kingdom of Niels, where dragons fly, Kyle, a "half-demon" knight of demonic descent who can speak the tongue of dragons, has a faithful reunion with his past lover, Alfred. Three years ago, for reasons he keeps to himself, Kyle bid farewell to his boyfriend, though he has never forgotten about him. But Alfred, who had once been his direct superior, is now just a count of the borders, a Margrave, while he is but an ordinary knight. Kyle also holds a certain secret, which he can never tell Alfred...Since he has no right to by his side, Kyle tries to distance himself from Alfred, but Alfred won't allow them to part―?

The Bisque Doll Falls in Love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

altTitles.ja: はめつのおうこく

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

She's the Strongest Bride in Another World, but It Seems I'm Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing through Cunning Tactics

description.en:
Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom!

Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course..... Night-time battles!

A slightly risqué harem comedy begins!
description.id:
Albert, yang bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain, mengincar kehidupan yang damai di Kerajaan Alexa. Namun, dia diculik oleh Marida, ras wanita iblis, makhluk terkuat di bumi untuk memandunya dalam peperangan. Albert yang tidak dapat kembali ke negara asalnya, memutuskan untuk tinggal di Kerajaan Elancia. Marida yang memiliki tubuh yang menarik dan pemikiran yang baik, akhirnya mereka bekerja sama, ia memanfaatkan pengetahuan modernnya untuk membuat prestasi besar dalam urusan rumah tangga, urusan militer, konspirasi, dll!?

(MTL)
description.ja: 異世界に転生したアルベルトはアレクサ王国で安泰な生活を目指していた。しかし、地上最強生物で鮮血鬼と呼ばれる鬼人族の女性マリーダに攫われ、しかも襲撃の手引きをしたとして、王国から指名手配される。エランシア帝国でマリーダの婿として生きていくことを決めたアルベルトは、魅力的な肉体を持つマリーダとの夜の営みに励みつつ、現代知識を活かして、内政、軍事、謀略などで大きな功績を挙げる！？

A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

altTitles.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...
description.ja:
可愛すぎる女体化男子の恋の行方は――！？

上杉ケースケの悩みは男子なのに小さくて可愛いこと。ある日、片想いの相手・のえるが「上杉が女の子だったらめっちゃ可愛くない!？」と話しているのを聞いてしまう。

「オレ、男扱いもされてないってこと…!？」

幼なじみで何でもできる瑛人には、身長も勉強も勝てないし、失恋もしちゃうし…。落ち込むケースケが、家の隣の神社で恋がかなうようにお願いをしてみると、身体が女の子になっちゃって――!?

altTitles.ja: ガンダムエグザ　ブイエス
ガンダムEXAVS

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

title.en: The Demon Prince of the Momochi House

altTitles.ja: 百千さん家のあやかし王子

altTitles.vi: Hoàng Tử Vệ Thần Nhà Momochi

altTitles.th: เจ้าชายปีศาจบ้านโมโมจิ

altTitles.es-la: El Príncipe Demonio de la Residencia Momochi

description.en: Momochi Himari after being an orphan inherited a house out of nowhere. She decided to occupy that house despite the warnings she received. According to the folks, the House of Momochi is haunted. There she met three guys who live in the house, Aoi, Yukari, and Ise. Then she discovered something unusual about them. What will happen to Himari's peaceful life when she decided to stay there?
description.pt-br: Himari, apesar de ser um órfã, inesperadamente herda uma velha casa. Apesar dos avisos que ela recebe sobre a Casa Momichi ser assombrada, ela decide ir morar lá de qualquer maneira. Logo descobre que a casa já está ocupado por três homens um pouco estranhos, Aoi, Yukari e Ise, os quais podem ou não possuir habilidades sobrenaturais para combater os maus espíritos. O que acontece quando a teimosa Himari decide ficar, apesar de lhe ter sido dito para sair.

description.en: The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

altTitles.ja: 若葉さんちの青い恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Wakaba San Chi no Aoi Koi

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Màu Lam Nhà Wakaba

description.en: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest is having a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.
description.ja: 若葉家四姉妹は今、全員が“初恋”の真っ最中。 長女・心春（こはる）はバイト先の先輩、 次女・真夏（まなつ）は趣味が一緒の弓道部の子、 三女・秋楽（あきら）は同じ部活の同級生、 四女・千冬は同じクラスの男子、 それぞれ好きな人に「好き」って気持ちをどう伝えようか 仲の良い四姉妹は日夜、恋のお悩み相談を繰り広げています。 四姉妹それぞれの片想いを見守る “初恋”観察ラブコメディー、開幕！ ◆作者コメント 初連載です！　がんばります！！
description.vi:
Dưới mái nhà kia, có đến bốn trái tim đang loạn nhịp!

Nhà Wakaba có bốn chị em, ai nấy đều đang tuổi xuân căng mọng, xinh đẹp vô bờ.
Và tất nhiên rồi, cái tuổi học sinh sinh viên mới nhú mà, dĩ nhiên phải có gia vị tình yêu quyện vào nó mới trọn vẹn được. Chị cả thì phải lòng tiền bối ở chỗ làm thêm, chị hai, ba và cô em út thì đang phải lòng bạn cùng trường. Và rồi cứ mỗi đêm, cả nhà lại ngồi quây quần với nhau, tâm sự chuyện yêu đương đàn đúm đủ kiểu. Liệu cặp nào sẽ bùng nổ trước đây ta?

Còn nội dung sâu xa thể nào ấy hả? Vào đọc đi rồi biết, hứa không uổng thì giờ hảo ngọt của bạn đâu!

title.en: Magical Girl Tsubame: I Will (Not) Save The World!

altTitles.ja: 対世界用魔法少女つばめ

description.en: The world is in danger! Who will rise to protect it? Introducing Tsubame, an ordinary high school student who dreams of becoming a magical girl. But if she has to choose between the world and her friends... A new adventure from Mapollo 3, the creator of PPPPPP! Buckle up for some passion, magical girls, and a dash of madness!

altTitles.ja: さようなら竜生こんにちは人生

altTitles.en: Goodbye Dragon Life, Hello Human Life

altTitles.ru: Прощай, жизнь дракона, Здравствуй, жизнь человека

description.en: The strongest and oldest dragon who had lived through eternity allowed himself to be killed by Hero. Just as he prepared for eternal sleep, he realized himself reborn as Dran, a villager in the frontier. Working the field, hunting forest animal, and having a warm life has filled his heart with joy he never experienced in his whole dragon life. One day, when he's patrolling the forest near his village, he encountered a powerful demon army.
description.es:
El Dragón más antiguo y poderoso del mundo se cansó de su vida, así que elige morir cuando los héroes vengan por él. Pero sucede un giro inesperado después de su muerte, fue reencarnado como un humano. Él en su alivio, decide vivir una vida como un humano en todo su esplendor, y recupera su voluntad de vivir… pero debido a su gran cantidad de poder mágico, él resulta envuelto en muchos problemas, así que su misión es acabar con todo lo que moleste su tranquilidad, y así disfrutar de su nueva vida con los amigos que encuentra en el camino.  


---
description.ja: 生に飽いた最強最古の竜が、辺境の青年として「人生」を生きる──!!　悠久の時を過ごした最強最古の竜は、自ら勇者に討たれたが、気付くと村人に転生していた。

title.en: Omiai Shitakunakatta node, Murinandai na Jouken wo Tsuketara Doukyuusei ga Kita Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.en: About That Time I Didn’t Want to Have a Matchmaking Interview, So I Set Some Impossible Conditions and Then My Classmate Showed Up
I Didn’t Want to Meet a Prospective Marriage Partner So I Set an Impossible Condition and Then My Classmate Came

altTitles.ja: お見合いしたくなかったので、無理難題な条件をつけたら同級生が来た件について

altTitles.es: No Quería ir a la Cita, Así que Puse Condiciones Absurdas y Vino una Compañera de Clases

altTitles.es-la: En ese Momento no Quería Tener una Entrevista de Emparejamiento, así que Puse Algunas Condiciones Imposibles y Luego Apareció mi Compañero de Clase

description.en:
One day, Yuzuru Takasegawa — a first-year high school student — is urged by his grandfather to go on an arranged marriage meeting, insisting that he wants to see his great-grandson before he dies.

However, not wanting to bear the weight of a fiancee at the tender age of a freshman in high school, Yuzuru tries to avoid the arranged marriage meeting by imposing an irrational condition that, “If she is Blonde Haired, Blue Eyed, Fair Skinned with big boobs, only then I will think about the marriage”.

But somehow, he finds the girl who meets the conditions that Yuzuru has put out, and he reluctantly ends up going to matchmaking only once.

And on the day of matchmaking, it was Arisa Yukishiro, a beautiful girl with reputation at school, shows up on the scene. [adapted from Novel Updates]
description.es: Un día, su abuelo insta a Yuzuru Takasegawa, un estudiante de primer año de secundaria, a asistir a una reunión matrimonial arreglada, insistiendo en que quiere ver a su bisnieto antes de morir. Sin embargo, al no querer soportar el peso de una prometida a la tierna edad de un estudiante de primer año en la escuela secundaria, Yuzuru intenta evitar la reunión matrimonial arreglada imponiendo una condición irracional que dice: "Si es de pelo rubio, ojos azules, piel clara, etc. ., sólo entonces pensaré en el matrimonio ”. Pero de alguna manera, encuentra a la chica que cumple con las condiciones que Yuzuru ha puesto, y de mala gana termina yendo al emparejamiento solo una vez. Y el día del emparejamiento, Arisa Yukishiro, una hermosa chica con reputación en la escuela, apareció en escena. Al escuchar su historia, parece que también la obligaron a regañadientes a continuar el emparejamiento. Por lo tanto, los dos intentan evitar más propuestas de matrimonio con su falso "compromiso".
description.ja:
私と嘘の“婚約”をしませんか？ 嘘から始まるピュアラブコメディ開幕!!

お見合い話を持ってくる祖父に「金髪碧眼色白美少女なら考える」と、無理難題をつきつけた高校生・高瀬川由弦。数日後、お見合いの場にいたのは同級生の雪城愛理沙!? 由緒ある家に生まれたため、幾度となくお見合いを勧められうんざりしていた二人は、お互いのために、嘘の『婚約』を交わすことになるのだが…。嘘の婚約から始まるピュアラブコメディ、開幕！

title.en: I Raised the Prince to Be Blackened

altTitles.zh: Wo Ba Huangzi Yang Hei Huale

description.en: Feng Yufei conscientiously did the system task - humiliating the male lead to stimulate his fighting spirit and let him ascend to the position of Ninth Five Lord. Unexpectedly, he missed the arrow at the beginning, and saved the male lead from the opponent, and became the little sun in the male lead's heart. Since then, all missions have gone off track...

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

altTitles.ja: エイティエイトを2でわって

description.en:
Mitsuru Fujita is a girl who loves playing piano. When she moves into her high school dormitory, her roommate is Kanade Kobayashi, a former rival at piano competitions. She was hailed as a prodigy, but Kanade has given up the piano due to trauma she suffered while studying abroad. Until Mitsuru invites Kanade to play a duet with her…

(Source: Manga Time Kirara, translated)

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.
